alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 11:48AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Yazoo and central Madison Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Canton to near Ridgeland. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Canton around 1155 AM CDT. Way around 1205 PM CDT. Vaughan and Sharon around 1210 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central Mississippi.
